mapper.select:
SELECT StorageID AS "StorageID" , DN_ID AS "DN_ID" , ServiceType AS "ServiceType" , SeverName AS "SeverName" , LastSeq AS "LastSeq" , FileURL AS "FileURL" , FilePath AS "FilePath" , ImageURL AS "ImageURL" , ImagePath AS "ImagePath" , InlineURL AS "InlineURL" , InlinePath AS "InlinePath" , VideoURL AS "VideoURL" , VideoPath AS "VideoPath" , IsUse AS "IsUse" , Description AS "Description" , TO_CHAR(RegistDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "RegistDate" FROM com_storage
AND StorageID = #{storageID}
